text: Little Bird of Happiness (1988, Persian:پرنده کوچک خوشبختی) is an Iranian film by the director Pouran Derakhshandeh. The script was written by Sirus Taslimi. The original Persian title is Parandeyeh koochake khoshbakhti. The film won the Crystal Simorgh for Best Film (co-winner with Kani Manga by Seifollah Dad).IMDb ==References== category:Iranian films Category:1988 films Category:Persian-language films Category:Crystal Simorgh for Best Film winners
title: Little Bird of Happiness (1988 film)
